main_page.message_subheader: Share securely and only with one person, once.
main_page.message_header_encrypted: We have it encrypted for you!
main_page.message_subheader_encrypted: It can be only once and will self-destruct after 24 hours or when the recipient reads it.
main_page.message_subheader_copied: Hurry up, the links are valid for 24 hours!
main_page.message_click_to_copy: Click here to copy the shareable url!

retrieval_page.message_header: Keep safe! This is just for you!
retrieval_page.message_subheader: This message can only be read this once and will self-destruct in 60 seconds.
retrieval_page.message_subheader_copied: If you have not copied the value, you will need to ask the person who sent you to share it again.
